title: WWII hero still a savior to those he knows
text:
WWII hero still a savior to those he knows Leave this field blank Your friends e-mail addresses (comma separated): * Subject: * Are you human? * You must enter the characters with black color that stand out from the other characters 
Hire Heroes USA paid tribute to 92-year-old John Hufton, a humble hero who served his country in WWII and continues to serve his Fuquay-Varina community.
